metadata.name: The beginning morning
metadata.description:
A new year has begun.
Ritsu-chan is visiting the shrine in her kimono.
What does she wish for?



Hello, this is IKOAN.
In this work, I have scattered various colors to wish for brighter days in the new year.
I've included "One Fuji, Two Hawks, Three Eggplants", which is considered to be a good omen in Japan, in my work, so please look for it.

Please look forward to the story of IKOAN that is about to begin.
